questions.question_text: Modified Agent Client Collector policies do not take effect until what action is taken?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/agent-client-collector/task/create-edit-policies.html

Selected Answer: B
You have to republish any policy you change, or it will not change the table on the instance and take effect. Restarting agents will only read the old unmodified table.

questions.question_text: What does the Asynchronous Messaging Bus (AMB) channel do on the MID Server?

choices.D: Continually queries the External Communication Channel (ECC) queue via a persistent query
choices.A: Opens an inbound connection to the MID Server
choices.C: Sends heartbeat information to the ServiceNow instance to ensure MID is communicating
choices.B: Allows Web Server transactions to be passed to ServiceNow

choices.A: The process responsible for defining, analyzing, planning, measuring, and improving all aspects of the availability of IT services
choices.D: The process responsible for recovery action and planning through machine learning
choices.B: The process responsible for ensuring the capacity of IT Services and IT infrastructure is able to deliver agreed upon service level targets in a cost-effective manner
choices.C: The process responsible for monitoring all abnormal occurrences throughout the IT infrastructure, allowing for normal operations, and detecting and escalating exception conditions

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is the best answer

Selected Answer: C
I would choose C as well
C. The process responsible for monitoring all abnormal occurrences throughout the IT infrastructure, allowing for normal operations, and detecting and escalating exception conditions
